bill_title: authorize certain representatives of railroad workers to investigate the railroad for safety purposes.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize certain representatives of railroad workers to investigate the railroad for safety purposes. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That the code be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: The collective bargaining representative for each craft of railroad worker and the state director for each craft of railroad worker may monitor the safety practices and operations on each railroad. The representative and director may carry out any inspection, examination, and investigation on railroad property necessary to determine compliance with applicable safety laws and regulations. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
